integration_patterns: Cloud storage integration with AWS S3
Real-time data streaming with Azure Event Hubs

evidence.claim: RedKnot Care utilizes AWS for cloud services.
The company adheres to HIPAA regulations for data protection.
RedKnot implements HL7 standards for healthcare data exchange.
They use FHIR to ensure interoperability with EHRs.
X12 EDI is part of their transaction processing framework.

icp.icp_reason: RedKnot Care focuses on HIPAA compliant X12 EDI transactions, indicating ICP alignment.
